title: How does a boy know if he is gay? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s really interesting…how many folks, both here and elsewhere on Quora, answer this question with “he is sexually attracted to boys and men.” Yeah - and that’s why a boy thinks he is gay. But the real question is, “How does he know?” You think, perhaps you might be gay, when… You are eleven, and you think that you will someday have a boyfriend and be happy…You are in the locker room, and you easily overcome the taboo against staring--can’t stop staring, in fact…You date a girl, finally, at fourteen--and after kissing her you think, “This is what everyone thinks I should want,” and you are close to tears.You’re fascinated with your best friend and terrified to tell him—to tell anyone—because of what they might think…You are tired of lying, of faking, of beings something other than you…You stare at the beautiful pictures, wishing over and over again that you could just…But then you close the magazine.Yeah. That’s when you think you might be gay. And then, at some point, you give yourself just the slightest bit of permission… You reach out and touch a boy's hand, and he smiles…Or the day when a special person's lips come towards you, and your eyes actually close…And feel his hands on you and you are on fire, and it’s so warm that you stop thinking at all for just a moment…And for just that moment--for the first time--you stop feeling the fear that has been with you for what feels like forever.And you think…Maybe I am, and it's going to be OK.
